english-tips-for-brazilians-connectors.post_description: Connectors are words (or conjunctions) used to join two phrases, doing a relationship between them. Sample in Portuguese: portanto, logo, pois, como, mas, embora, porque, entretanto. Here you can see a list of some connectors that you can use.

sql-server-recursion-cte.post_title: SQL Server: Recursividade com WITH common_table_expression (CTE)
sql-server-recursion-cte.post_description: Um exemplo do uso de common table expression (CTE) usando consultas recursivas.

english-tips-for-brazilians-acronyms.post_title: English tips for Brazilians: Acronyms and Abbreviations
english-tips-for-brazilians-acronyms.post_description: Acronyms and abbreaviations are normally used for speed up the writting. A tipically case is when you are “talking” over the Skype, Whatsapp or any digital tool.

esl-connectors.post_description: Connectors are words (or conjunctions) used to join two phrases, doing a relationship between them. Sample in Portuguese: portanto, logo, pois, como, mas, embora, porque, entretanto. Here you can see a list of some connectors that you can use.
